name: electron-vue-spring
description: A minimal starter project for using Electron, Vue and Spring.
author: Wu, Ruoyun

scripts.build-vue: cd vue && npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 dist/*.* ../spring/src/main/resources/public && cd ..
scripts.clean-vue: cd vue && npm run clean && rimraf ../spring/src/main/resources/public && cd ..
scripts.pack: npm run build-vue && npm run build-spring && build --dir
scripts.build: npm run build-vue && npm run build-spring && build
